name: Tank Up 2018
description:
Tank Up is nice block breaker game with shooter tank. Control your tank, fire up tanks and break bricks and blocks

== Fire out tanks and break as many tanks as you can to earn more money.
== With money, upgrade your tank and unlock new ones to fire up balls more.

Game Features:
- Free to play
- Endless gameplay
- Simple swipe control

How far can you go??
